long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the key aspects for customer success to assess health of their customer is by monitoring product usage through tracking the end-user's actions on the source web-application.
Churn360 visual tagger provides the ability for a non-technical person to configure the events on a web-application that needs to be tracked in order to build product usage metrics. Code-Free.
Usage data are displayed in churn360 portal. To try it out: https://churn360.com/request-demo
